price: 86. Oo uma leh awood shafeeco kuwa ay baryaan (Alle) ka sokow, hase ahaatee ciddii qirta xaqa (ashahaadada ee ku dhaqma) oo aqoon san u leh (waxbay u shafeeci Idanka Alle kaddib).
arabic: وَلَا يَمۡلِكُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِهِ ٱلشَّفَٰعَةَ إِلَّا مَن شَهِدَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَهُمۡ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walā yamliku alladhīna yadʿūna min dūnihi al-shafāʿata illā man shahida bil-ḥaqi wahum yaʿlamūna
